backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no implemented logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature-evidence report mapping features to involved files, components, and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Partial deployment guide outlining build checks for deploying the frontend to IC.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables and light/dark mode styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up root element, icons, manifest, and main script.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, theme colors, and icons.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wiring tabs for entry, stats, and history views with learned-state updates.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Header component with app icon, title, and subtitle.
frontend/src/components/SkipToContent.ts: Accessibility link enabling keyboard users to jump to main content.
frontend/src/features/analytics/StatsAna: Stats view computing and displaying performance metrics, ROI, and calibration.
Main component for entering race odds, generating predictions, validating inputs, and saving race entries with optional bet details.
frontend/src/features/entries/types.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for race entries, contenders, bet details, and form data.
frontend/src/features/entries/validation: Provides validation functions for contenders, winner selection, podium finish order, and margin inputs.
frontend/src/features/help/AndroidApkHel: Empty placeholder file for Android APK help content.
frontend/src/features/history/HistoryLis: Renders a sorted list of past race entries showing prediction accuracy, bet outcomes, and race details.
frontend/src/features/learning/accuracyV: Maps accuracy percentages to corresponding color and emoji indicators.
frontend/src/features/learning/LearningS: Displays learning metrics including accuracy, ROI, and training status using visual indicators.
frontend/src/features/learning/metrics.t: Calculates performance metrics such as accuracy, ROI, Brier score, and strategy-based ROI from race entries.
frontend/src/features/learning/model.ts: Implements prediction logic combining weighted signals, generating implied probabilities, confidence, and winner selection.
frontend/src/features/reset/ResetAppMemo: React button component that shows a confirmation dialog and triggers a full reset of stored app data.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the userâ€™s Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and logic for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and authentication state.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles and a custom color palette for light/dark themes with improved accessibility.
frontend/src/lib/betSizing.ts: Calculates a suggested bet amount using a simplified Kelly-based edge and confidence model with explanatory text.
frontend/src/lib/oddsFormat.ts: Utility functions for formatting numeric odds into fractional string representations.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility wrapper combining clsx and tailwind-merge for safer className merging.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider and mounts it to the DOM.
frontend/src/storage/localMemoryStore.ts: Manages loading, saving, and defaulting of race entries and learned prediction state in localStorage.
frontend/src/storage/storageKeys.ts: Defines version and key constants used for storing entries and learned state in localStorage.
frontend/src/storage/useOnDeviceMemory.t: React hook that loads, saves, and clears on-device entries and learned state, and recomputes learned state whenever entries change.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current architecture, goals, constraints, known issues, and existing feature records for the prediction app.
